value:
$nMPID_リーヴ|I see Alfonse over there... Before
my world was destroyed, I must
have worn a smile like his.

$nMPID_リーヴ|After everything that has happened...
Can the warmth of love really change
anything?

$nMPID_スラシル|I see that Princess Veronica is joining
in the festivities... Back then, I had no
idea what love was.

$nMPID_リーヴ|Stay close, Veronica. We must
appear festive. The living are
watching.

$nMPID_スラシル|This clothing is so ostentatious... It's
been so long since I've worn anything
like it. Does it look strange, Alfonse?

$nMPID_スラシル|I bring notice of the Day of Devotion.
Join the festivities while you yet live.

$nMPID_スラシル|Even in death, we two will not
be parted.

$nMPID_リーヴ|Love that cannot be sundered...
It may exist in this world.

$nMPID_スラシル|Failure... It was our misjudgment
to get drawn into this festival.

$nMPID_リーヴ|This power is needed...to oppose
the gods.

$nMPID_リーヴ|I am...Líf. She is known as Thrasir.
Though the Day of Devotion means
nothing to us, we will do our duty.

$nMPID_リーヴ|The Day of Devotion... An event that
holds no meaning for the dead, who
exist only as memories...$k$pWe have no future. For us, love
has no meaning.$k$pHowever...Veronica, I do have you.$k$p$nMPID_スラシル|And I, you. Our future and our world
were both lost. For me, only you
have remained.$k$pIf our bond can even be called love...
I can use that love. It is a support to
carry me forward—for eternity.
たあっ
これで…
うああっ
You're being serious...
Impertinent...
$nMPID_二人|A gift.
$nMPID_二人|Let us go. Yes.
$nMPID_リーヴ|This, too, is my duty.
$nMPID_スラシル|Take this.
Fate was crueler...
You can do this.
I'm watching.
"Take it." "We insist."
"Alfonse..." "Yes?"
sigh...
"Strange, isn't it?" "It certainly is."
Now what?
Orders.
A gift? For me?

$nMPID_リーヴ|That unsavory cadre of gods... What
are they doing with us?

$nMPID_スラシル|Who can say? Her instructions were so
vague... "When you arrive, you will
understand."
$nMPID_リーヴ|Have you noticed anything?

$nMPID_スラシル|What is there to notice? It is a simple
festival. These people always find
some excuse to celebrate.

$nMPID_リーヴ|The Day of Devotion... A day to
express gratitude to those
important to you.

$nMPID_スラシル|This festival is not meant for us. We
should go.

Your mother and father are here... How
much longer can you bear to stay?
$nMPID_リーヴ|...

They will save our world... That is what
they promised us, those gods.

Even if our world were to be saved, as
we wish it to be...

$nMPID_スラシル|It would be no place for us. In a world
that's saved, we are nothing...

$nMPID_リーヴ|As you say. But, Veronica,
remember this...
We are not alone.
$nMPID_スラシル|Alfonse...

Yes. We are not alone. No matter
what happens...

$nMPID_リーヴ|Let us go. We need to focus on
uncovering the weaknesses of
those gods...
$nMPID_スラシル|Very well. We will do as you suggest.
